meta.title: Contract #008: The Double
meta.description: IDENTITY THEFT: Suspect spotted in two locations simultaneously. One timestamp is corrupted.
meta.journal: The 'Cafe Sightings' were a deepfake projection. The suspect wasn't drinking coffee; they were draining the ATM. The corrupted timestamp on the withdrawal log was a deliberate attempt to hide the sequence.

nodes.text: 14:00 - ATM Camera: Subject approaches terminal. Face obscured.
--:-- - ATM Log: Admin Access granted via cloned keycard.
14:05 - Social Media: Subject posts selfie from 'The Grind Cafe' (Metadata confirmed).
14:15 - Street Cam: Subject enters getaway vehicle (Black Sedan).
